'''Embroidered Curtains''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Embroidered Curtains is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

This item's blueprint was temporarily obtainable from the [[Mimi Tomo]] event in [[Version 1.5]], and was permanently added to the Realm Depot stock in [[Version 2.0]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|time = 16h
